description.en:
The NEXO Token is an asset-backed token and is backed by the underlying assets of Nexo’s loan portfolio. NEXO Tokens Holders will get 30% of the company’s profits.
NEXO Tokens offer additional utility features such as discounted interest rates on the Nexo Instant Crypto-backed Loans and are also accepted as collateral on the Nexo Platform.

ico_data.short_desc: Nexo - The World’s First Instant Crypto Overdrafts. Powered by Credissimo - A Leading FinTech Group serving millions of people across Europe for over 10 years.

status_updates.description: You've read the news. It’s a good time to make your gold work for you with our PAXG-backed Crypto Credit Lines™. https://nexo.io/instant-crypto-loans/paxg-loan

Ditto BlockDown 2020 - we’re delighted to be a Diamond sponsor!

And we’re even more delighted to give our loyal community a 20% discount on Business and VIP tickets with the code: Nexo20

Join us online on June 18-19! https://bit.ly/3cSJJ9D
In case you’ve missed it, watch Antoni Trenchev contest Goldman Sachs’ stance on #Bitcoin at Messari’s #Mainnet2020 & find out why BTC is our generation’s gold. https://bit.ly/2UtUYyP

50k followers on June 5! 

We’re celebrating this milestone two years after the launch of our platform and we thank you for all your support through our journey because what’s a success story without its successful supporters! https://bit.ly/307JpkC

“History Indicates Bitcoin Toward $20,000 in 2020 - it’s mirroring the 2016 return to its previous peak. That was the last time supply was halved and the third year after a significant peak.” Bloomberg

Make the most of your Bitcoin investment with Nexo. https://data.bloomberglp.com/professional/sites/10/Bloomberg-Indices-Outlook_Cryptos_June-2020.pdf

We are delighted to be sponsoring Messari’s #Mainnet2020, the global virtual event gathering crypto‘s pioneers.

The Nexo team is online until June 3 and happy to discuss any potential partnerships and cooperation! https://app.hopin.to/events/mainnet/expo/23605

The future of finance comes closer with Antoni Trenchev‘s presentation Messari‘s #Mainnet2020 at 12:50 PM (ET), June 2! 

Join Nexo and the impressive lineup of industry top thinkers and builders working towards advancing the development of our sovereign financial future. https://bit.ly/2XO9UbQ
